medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 3 PM this afternoon, localized in the right lower quadrant without migration or radiation. Patient tried Tylenol without relief and last ate soup at noon today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hyperlipidemia (HLD), history of colonic adenoma, left wrist surgery after workplace injury, left elbow surgery for blood clot and possible ulnar nerve transposition.
